features.html:
Consider the following method, which is intended to return the index  i  for which the value of  predicted[i]  is furthest from the value of  actual[i].

 

For example, if  predicted  contains the values  {60, 65, 62, 68, 70, 72, 68}  and  actual  contains the values  {64, 68, 60, 67, 76, 72, 70},  then  difference  should return  4,  because the corresponding elements with values that are furthest from each other are  predicted[4]  and  actual[4].
